alert.note: Alert for Kauai North; Kauai Southwest; Koolau Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Olomana; Waianae Coast (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued January 05 at 6:38AM HST until January 06 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR NORTH FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI MAUI AND THE BIG ISLAND... ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU AND MOLOKAI... .Large, long-period north and northwest swells will combine to produce high surf along exposed shorelines. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Surf peaking between 15 to 20 feet along north facing shores. Surf between 12 to 16 feet along west facing shores. * WHERE...North and west facing shores of Niihau, Kauai, and Oahu. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Expect strong breaking waves, shore break, and strong longshore and rip currents making swimming difficult and dangerous.
info.instruction: Beachgoers, swimmers, and surfers should heed all advice given by ocean safety officials and exercise caution.

area.areaDesc: Kauai North; Kauai Southwest; Koolau Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Olomana; Waianae Coast
